54 // List of exceptions which can be thrown by the CommandListManager class.
55 CREATE_MOVEIT_ERROR_CODE_EXCEPTION(NegativeBlendRadiusException, moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_MOTION_PLAN);
56 CREATE_MOVEIT_ERROR_CODE_EXCEPTION(LastBlendRadiusNotZeroException, moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_MOTION_PLAN);

58 CREATE_MOVEIT_ERROR_CODE_EXCEPTION(OverlappingBlendRadiiException, moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::INVALID_MOTION_PLAN);
59 CREATE_MOVEIT_ERROR_CODE_EXCEPTION(PlanningPipelineException, moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes::FAILURE);

65 class CommandListManager
66 {
67 public:
68  CommandListManager(const ros::NodeHandle& nh, const robot_model::RobotModelConstPtr& model);
69 
101  RobotTrajCont solve(const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& planning_scene,
102  const planning_pipeline::PlanningPipelinePtr& planning_pipeline,
103  const moveit_msgs::MotionSequenceRequest& req_list);
104 
105 private:
106  using MotionResponseCont = std::vector<planning_interface::MotionPlanResponse>;
107  using RobotState_OptRef = boost::optional<const robot_state::RobotState&>;
108  using RadiiCont = std::vector<double>;
109  using GroupNamesCont = std::vector<std::string>;
110 
111 private:
119  void checkForOverlappingRadii(const MotionResponseCont& resp_cont, const RadiiCont& radii) const;
120 
130  MotionResponseCont solveSequenceItems(const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& planning_scene,
131  const planning_pipeline::PlanningPipelinePtr& planning_pipeline,
132  const moveit_msgs::MotionSequenceRequest& req_list) const;
133 
139  bool checkRadiiForOverlap(const robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory& traj_A, const double radii_A,
140  const robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectory& traj_B, const double radii_B) const;
141 
142 private:
147  static RobotState_OptRef getPreviousEndState(const MotionResponseCont& motion_plan_responses,
148  const std::string& group_name);
149 
154  static void setStartState(const MotionResponseCont& motion_plan_responses, const std::string& group_name,
155  moveit_msgs::RobotState& start_state);
156 
165  static RadiiCont extractBlendRadii(const moveit::core::RobotModel& model,
166  const moveit_msgs::MotionSequenceRequest& req_list);
167

175  const moveit_msgs::MotionSequenceItem& item_B);
176 
180  static void checkForNegativeRadii(const moveit_msgs::MotionSequenceRequest& req_list);
181 
185  static void checkLastBlendRadiusZero(const moveit_msgs::MotionSequenceRequest& req_list);
186 
191  static void checkStartStatesOfGroup(const moveit_msgs::MotionSequenceRequest& req_list, const std::string& group_name);
192 
197  static void checkStartStates(const moveit_msgs::MotionSequenceRequest& req_list);
198 
203  static GroupNamesCont getGroupNames(const moveit_msgs::MotionSequenceRequest& req_list);
204 
205 private:
207  ros::NodeHandle nh_;
208 
210  moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr model_;
211 
214  PlanComponentsBuilder plan_comp_builder_;
215 };
216 
217 inline void CommandListManager::checkLastBlendRadiusZero(const moveit_msgs::MotionSequenceRequest& req_list)
218 {
219  if (req_list.items.back().blend_radius != 0.0)
220  {
221  throw LastBlendRadiusNotZeroException("The last blending radius must be zero");
222  }
223 }
